about_the_game:
Chastity Catastrophe is a action platformer where instead of beating up enemies, you break your friends out of chastity equipment!
It's a DRM-free game made for Windows, Mac, and Linux computers with the following features:
  • Unlock your Horngry friends by hitting them with your sledge hammer!
  • Pair up characters in-game so that they can cuddle-- and also have sex.
  • Over 40 unique animations to discover.
  • Explore a fantasy world full of anthropomorphic dragons, kobolds, and wolves.
  • Solve the mystery of the ongoing chastity crisis!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains graphic depictions of sexual intercourse, as well as graphic nudity and chastity themed clothing.

Sexual acts are consensual, though initiated by player dictated matchmaking.

Freeing characters from chastity restrictions involves cartoon violence. No blood is depicted.

detailed_description:
Chastity Catastrophe is a action platformer where instead of beating up enemies, you break your friends out of chastity equipment!
It's a DRM-free game made for Windows, Mac, and Linux computers with the following features:
  • Unlock your Horngry friends by hitting them with your sledge hammer!
  • Pair up characters in-game so that they can cuddle-- and also have sex.
  • Over 40 unique animations to discover.
  • Explore a fantasy world full of anthropomorphic dragons, kobolds, and wolves.
  • Solve the mystery of the ongoing chastity crisis!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04, or CentOS 7
  • Processor: AMD 5 2500/Intel i5-7200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 8570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OS must support Vulkan, see:
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: AMD 5 2500/Intel i5-7200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 940MX
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OS must support Vulkan, see:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: 2.6 GHZ Dual Core Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
